verbose_text: MMI-0100 suppressed LPS induced activation of astrocytes and microglia, and dramatically decreased a series of pro inflammatory cytokines such as TNF-alpha, IL-6, IL-1beta, COX-2, and iNOS via inhibiting phosphorylation of MK2, but not ERK, JNK, and p38 in vivo and in vitro.
evidence: TNF-alpha, IL-6, IL-1beta, COX-2, and iNOS via inhibiting phosphorylation of MK2
